title: Flag Halyard - PP225 - Brushed Steel
body: Flag Halyard Chair of Hans Wegner back in 1950. Although it hints a futuristic touch, it was surprisingly conceived during one holiday in Wegner’s summerhouse. This one-of-a-kind armchair is made of solid stainless steel and it features a 240 meters specially developed flag line and a long-haired sheep skin made to make you enjoy the summer or a lazy afternoon in a more pleasurable way.
